title: Molecular design and functional outcomes of RTP and TADF traits in isomers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32221-32228
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05807K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Meiling Chen, Yuzhuo Chen, Ting Zhang, Hua Zhang, Zhiwen Xiao, Zhongzhen Su, Yunan Wu
Three isomers (3Fmo, 3Fmm, 3Fmp) were synthesized with distinct luminescent properties. 3Fmm showed room-temperature phosphorescence due to unique π–π stacking, while 3Fmo and 3Fmp exhibited TADF. 3Fmo excelled in cellular imaging.
